name: a Radioactive Mess
description:
this game was made for mini-game jam

story: you are in a post-apocalyptic radioactive universe trying to Survive the radioactivity and killing mutated monsters.

 Controls: arrows/WASD(movement), Shift(shoot)

feel free to provide feedback, hope you enjoyed playing the game

Note: there is a "bug" where the player only faces forward while in Idle, tell me if you like the game better this way or should I fix It, I personally feel it gives it a bit of a challenge which makes it more Fun.
